title: Discussion-Based Simulation Education for Strengthening Pharmaceutical Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pharmaceutical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A job-integrated training program for in-service professionals featuring VR-based discussions in real-world pharmacy scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts by over 30% through pro-con debates on controversial pharmaceutical topics.
Learners achieve a self-assessment score of at least 4 out of 5 (5-point scale) in critical thinking, communication, and teamwork competencies during discussions.
Learners improve job-related decision-making skills by over 25% when consulting patients and collaborating with peers in VR simulation environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
